dmca.title: Fw: DMCA Complaint - www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net - SECOND REQUEST!
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Top Secret Recipes, Inc. [mailto:copyright@topsecretrecipes.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 27, 2006 4:48 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com;
copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint - www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net - FINAL
NOTICE!


Dear Sirs,
 
After further research, I have found that indeed
"secretrestaurantrecipes.net" does reside in your network. This information
can easily be obtained through the "Who Is" service on the
Networksolutions.com website here:
http://www.networksolutions.com/whois/arin-details.jhtml;jsessionid=NJBCDCSL
XQR0ECWMEAQCFFA?whoistoken=5
<http://www.networksolutions.com/whois/arin-details.jhtml;jsessionid=NJBCDCS
LXQR0ECWMEAQCFFA?whoistoken=5&parenttoken=4> &parenttoken=4
 

SECRETRESTAURANTRECIPES.NET        

70.84.85.66        
Record Type:                   IP Address        

        

OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 

OrgID:      TPCM

Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Address:    Suite 110

City:       Dallas

StateProv:  TX

PostalCode: 75207

Country:    US



ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321



NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 

CIDR:       70.84.0.0/14 

NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13

NetHandle:  NET-70-84-0-0-1

Parent:     NET-70-0-0-0-0

NetType:    Direct Allocation

NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM

NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM

Comment:    

RegDate:    2004-07-29

Updated:    2006-02-17



RTechHandle: PP46-ARIN

RTechName:   Pathos, Peter 

RTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800

RTechEmail:  admins@theplanet.com 



OrgAbuseHandle: ABUSE271-ARIN

OrgAbuseName:   Abuse 

OrgAbusePhone:  +1-214-782-7802

OrgAbuseEmail:  abuse@theplanet.com



OrgNOCHandle: TECHN33-ARIN

OrgNOCName:   Technical Support 

OrgNOCPhone:  +1-214-782-7800

OrgNOCEmail:  admins@theplanet.com



OrgTechHandle: TECHN33-ARIN

OrgTechName:   Technical Support 

OrgTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800

OrgTechEmail:   <mailto:admins@theplanet.com> admins@theplanet.com
 
Your immediate reply is required to avoid further legal action.
 
Sincerely,
 
Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Legal Response <mailto:legal-response2@theplanet.com>  
To: admin@topsecretrecipes.com 
Cc: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com 
Sent: Wednesday, October 26, 2005 9:08 AM
Subject: FW: DMCA Complaint - www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net - SECOND
REQUEST!

Please note that the web site referenced in your DMCA notice does not reside
within our network as of 12:07:21 p.m. (GMT-6) on October 26, 2005.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet


  _____  

From: Top Secret Recipes, Inc. [mailto:admin@topsecretrecipes.com] 
Sent: Sunday, October 23, 2005 6:58 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Subject: Fw: DMCA Complaint - www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net - SECOND
REQUEST!
Importance: High


Dear Sirs,
 
To date we have not received a response from you regarding the copyright
infringement listed below.  Kindly respond.
 
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. 
 
 
Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
----- Original Message ----- 
 
Sent: Thursday, October 06, 2005 9:02 AM
Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint - www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net

October 6, 2005

To Whom It May Concern;
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named Todd Wilbur ("IP Owner")
(http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp). I have good faith belief
that the materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner,
it's agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the IP Owner's rights.  I
believe that cashed copies of the web site
http://www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net are hosted on one or more of your
server(s) at www.theplanet.com
 
Infringing material:

The sale of an ebook entitled "337 Restaurant Recipes Exposed" located here:
http://www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net/index2.html and accessed through
here:
http://www.secretrestaurantrecipes.net

Infringed work or right includes any of Todd Wilbur's original recipes,
either from his eight books in publication: 
 
Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1993)
More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1994)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1997)
Top Secret Recipes Lite (Penguin/Putnam 1998)
Low Fat Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2000)
TSR Sodas, Smoothies, spirits and Shakes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
Even More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
The Best of Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2003)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes II - Registration Number TXu1-198-872
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp
or any of the recipes he created for his web site located here:
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com.
 
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Pamela Ellis
Vice President; Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
10401 Orkiney Drive
Las Vegas, NV 89144
Email: copyright@topsecretrecipes.com
Telephone: 702-254-8125
Fax: 702-254-8660
 
Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing. Given that www.secretrestaurantrecipes.com
is primarily composed, if not completely composed of infringing material, if
possible please disable access to all cached copies of
www.secretrestaurantrecipes.com until further determination can be made. 
 

Truthfully,
 
 
Pamela Ellis
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
